CustomField.formula: IF(OR( Legal_Entity_Type__c == 'Trust', Legal_Entity_Type__c == 'Family Trust', Legal_Entity_Type__c == 'SMSF'),IF(ISPICKVAL(Trustee_Type__c, 'Corporate'), OR(ISPICKVAL(Is_Director_a_Beneficiary_Member__c, 'No'), ISPICKVAL(Is_Director_a_Beneficiary_Member__c, '')), FALSE), FALSE)
CustomField.label: Is Director a Ben/Mem Warning Check
